A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Felt like something i loved has been ripped from me.  I am very angry after having it sink in for 12 hours and getting angrier by the minute.  There are some things to like\, but a lot to complain about.\nI felt like Poe was just given random screen time and I ended up hating his character.  Finn had slightly better things to do.  The Rey-Kylo-Luke story is intriguing but the choices just left me upset.  Hopefully it is better upon second viewing but I have no idea what there is to do in Episode 9.
